thread.title: Andres Morales
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Andres Morales

author: Andres Morales
title: Andres Morales
text: This is the first filter changed after ten months . I ordered a new filter they came on time , they sent me four filters for less than $ 80.00. The price was affordable. I have not complains. I changed the filter by myself, I followed the manual instructions step by step. When i finished i opened the faucet to taste the water an TASTED GOO REALLY GOO . Thanks PELICAN I WILL RECOMEND. HAVE FUN! FROM THE SUNSHINE STATE ( FLORIDA) TEMP 80 Degree and we suppose to be in winter.
